snippet.title: Escape From Tethys Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Escape From Tethys is out now on Steam!

You're trapped, alone and cold on a distant planet. Pursued by a droid with only one purpose: killing everything. You must find an escape. Explore the hostile environment, find secret upgrades and new weapons, and finally make your escape from this dark, hostile planet...

Escape From Tethys is a platforming metroidvania inspired by classics like Environmental Station Alpha and Super Metroid. Check out the Steam page here:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/822540/Escape_From_Tethys
